exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TableUISkin" width="1440" height="810" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" >
	<e:Rect width="2000" height="1080" x="-280" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="-135"/>
	<e:Group id="group" width="1440" height="810" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="tableBG" source="gamebg2_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Label id="liduLabel" verticalCenter="304" fontFamily="黑体" x="154" width="115" height="30" y="694" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="tableBG2" source="bg3_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="1260" height="690" y="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image y="64" id="ganImg0" x="49" source="gan2_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="ganImg1" y="55" x="1369" source="gan2_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="leftLabel" text="等待确认花色" x="847" y="742" textColor="0xC5BBBB" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="rightLabel" text="等待确认花色" x="363" y="741" textColor="0xC5BBBB" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="lidudi" x="25" y="811" source="lidudi_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="lidu" x="28" y="813" source="lidu1_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group id="smallGroup" height="140" width="288" x="309" y="724" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image id="ball1" x="14" y="9" source="1s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball2" x="52" y="9" source="2s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball3" x="89" y="9" source="3s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball4" x="127" y="9" source="4s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball5" x="165" y="9" source="5s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball6" x="203" y="9" source="6s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball7" x="241" y="9" source="7s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball8" x="237" y="79" source="8s_png"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="bigGroup" x="798" width="288" y="729" height="140" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image id="ball9" x="14" y="9" source="9s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball10" x="51" y="9" source="10s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball11" x="88" y="9" source="11s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball12" x="125" y="9" source="12s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball13" x="165" y="9" source="13s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball14" x="203" y="9" source="14s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball15" x="240" y="9" source="15s_png"/>
			<e:Image id="ball16" x="236" y="80" source="8s_png"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="leftTurn" x="300" y="717" source="turn_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="rightTurn" y="717" x="786" source="turn_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="tipsBtn1" x="578" y="834" source="gantanhao_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="tipsBtn2" y="834" x="1064" source="gantanhao_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Button id="btnReady" label="准备" x="639" y="445" width="96" height="41" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnBg_png" source.down="btnBg_png" source.disabled="btnBg_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TipsUISkin" width="300" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="tipsIcon_png"/>
	<e:Label id="txt" text="打完自己花色所有球，打进黑8胜利，反之失败。" size="26" fontFamily="黑体" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameResultSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="1920" height="1080">

	<e:Rect id="alphaRect" alpha="0.6" width="5000" height="5000" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>

	<e:Image source="jiesuanBG_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-21%"/>


	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-15%">

		<e:Group id="group_result1" x="10" verticalCenter="-29.5">
			<e:Image id="img_result1" x="0" y="0" source=""/>

			<e:Group id="gp_people1" width="490" height="200" x="117" y="203"/>
			<e:Label id="lab_otherName" text="对手" x="30" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="672.73" size="40" anchorOffsetX="0"/>

		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="group_result2" x="807.72" y="0.91">
			<e:Image id="img_result2" x="0" y="0" source=""/>

			<e:Group id="gp_people2" width="490" height="200" x="117" y="203" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Label id="lab_myName" text="我" x="30" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="679.58" size="40"/>
			<e:Group id="group_flower" width="200" height="200" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="-170" x="-702.7200000000001" verticalCenter="0" y="128.09"/>
			<e:Label id="scorelable" text="分数" x="366.28" y="115.09" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="70" textColor="0xff0000"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="gp_particle" width="1575.39" height="558" x="-31" y="-41" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		</e:Group>
		</e:Group>

	<e:Group id="gp_wenzi" width="1578.79" height="539.39" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-20.5"/>
	<e:Group id="group_selected" anchorOffsetX="0" bottom="8.5%" horizontalCenter="0" width="576" height="159">
		<e:Rect width="155" height="155" x="-5" y="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseWidth="50" ellipseHeight="50" visible="false"/>
		<e:Rect width="310" height="155" x="272" y="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseWidth="50" ellipseHeight="50" anchorOffsetX="0" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_btns" bottom="8%" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Button id="btn_leave" label="" x="0" y="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnCancel_png" source.down="btnCancel_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="btn_again" label="" x="279" y="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="again_png" source.down="again_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LobbySkin" width="1440" height="810" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="166c814e577" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image fillMode="scale" source="bg0_png" width="2000" height="1080" y="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bg0_png" fillMode="scale" height="1080" y="-967" width="2000" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bg0_png" fillMode="scale" height="1080" y="965.35" width="2000" horizontalCenter="0"/>


	<e:Group id="selected" width="1300" height="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" top="70%">


		<e:Rect width="310" height="158" x="1236" y="73" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillColor="0xffffff" ellipseWidth="50" ellipseHeight="50"/>
		<e:Rect width="310" height="160" x="1246" y="83" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseWidth="50" ellipseHeight="50" visible="false"/>
		<e:Rect width="310" height="159" x="1256" y="93" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseWidth="50" ellipseHeight="50" visible="false"/>
		<e:layout>
		<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" paddingTop="0" gap="87"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group" width="1300" height="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" top="70%">
		<e:Button label="" x="-106" y="58" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="pipeiduizhan_png" source.down="pipeiduizhan_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button label="" x="-96" y="4" width="297" height="146">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="paiweiduizhan_png" source.down="paiweiduizhan_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
		<e:Button label="" x="-86" y="78" width="297" height="146">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="homemodle_png" source.down="homemodle_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:layout>
		<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="100"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>


</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSkin" width="1440" height="810" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="166c7e3a411" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image fillMode="scale" source="bg0_png" width="2000" height="1080" y="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bg0_png" fillMode="scale" height="1080" y="-969.03" width="2000" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bg0_png" fillMode="scale" height="1080" y="965.35" width="2000" horizontalCenter="0"/>


	<e:Group id="selected" width="1300" height="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" top="70%">

		<e:Rect width="310" height="159" x="1256" y="93" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseWidth="50" ellipseHeight="50" visible="false"/>
		<e:layout>
		<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" paddingTop="0" gap="86"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group" width="1300" height="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" top="70%">
		<e:Button label="" x="-106" y="58" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="pipeiduizhan_png" source.down="pipeiduizhan_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>

			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="paiweiduizhan_png" source.down="paiweiduizhan_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
		<e:Button label="" x="-86" y="78" width="297" height="146">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="homemodle_png" source.down="homemodle_png"/>

		<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="100"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="kingkong_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="120" width="400" height="400" visible="false"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LobbySkin" width="1440" height="810" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="166c814e577" ></w:Config>

	<e:Image id="bg" source="bg0_png" width="2000" height="1080" y="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image height="1080" y="-1051.67" source="bg0_png" width="2000" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image height="1080" y="967" source="bg0_png" width="2000" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="jiesuanBG_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" top="12%" width="85%" height="54%"/>
	<e:Group id="group" width="85%" height="54%" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" top="12%">
		<e:Group id="playerbg1_group" width="44%" height="77%" x="177" y="137">
			<e:Image id="pipeiIng_img" source="bg1_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
			<e:Image id="pipeidao_img" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="bg2_png" y="-461" width="718" x="0" visible="false"/>
			<e:Rect id="qrcodebg" width="300" height="300" fillColor="0xffffff" horizontalCenter="0" top="13%" anchorOffsetY="150" anchorOffsetX="150" visible="false"/>
			<e:Label id="saomatip" text="手机扫码立即加入" anchorOffsetX="0" width="396" anchorOffsetY="0" height="68" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40" horizontalCenter="0" y="0" visible="false"/>
			<e:Label id="player1_name" text="" x="50" anchorOffsetX="0" width="312" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" anchorOffsetY="0" top="0" height="12%" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Group id="txtGroup" width="717" height="100" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:Label text="正在匹配玩家" anchorOffsetX="0" width="650" anchorOffsetY="0" height="100" size="50" fontFamily="KaiTi" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
